title: Runtime arguments
description: The allowed runtime arguments for PowerModelsONM's [`entrypoint`](@ref entrypoint).

output.description: The path to the output file (JSON format)

faults.description: The path to the faults input file (JSON format)

events.description: The path to the events input file (JSON format)

inverters.description: The path to the inverters input file (JSON format)

settings.description: The path to the settings input file (JSON format)

quiet.description: A flag to indicate the log level should be :Error

verbose.description: A flag to indicate the log level should be :Info

debug.description: A flag to indicate the log level should be :Debug

gurobi.description: A flag to signal to use the Gurobi solver

knitro.description: A flag to signal to use the KNITRO solver

opt-switch-algorithm.description: Flag to use multinetwork problem for optimal switching algorithm

opt-disp-formulation.description: Formulation to use for [`optimize_dispath`](@ref optimize_dispatch), which includes the real power only formulation (`nfa`), the LinDist3Flow formulation (`lindistflow`), the AC-rectangular formulation (`acr`), or the AC-polar formulation (`acp`)

opt-disp-solver.description: Which solver (from the solver instances built-in to ONM) to use for the optimal dispatch problem. WARNING: solver capabilities should match the optimal dispatch formulation

fix-small-numbers.description: Will prune small impedances, admittances, and lengths, for better problem solving stability

network-file.description: DEPRECIATED: the path to the network file (DSS format)

output-file.description: DEPRECIATED: the path to the output file (JSON format)

problem.description: DEPRECIATED: algorithm to use for [`optimize_dispatch`](@ref optimize_dispatch), either the optimal power flow (`opf`) or load shed (`mld`)

formulation.description: DEPRECIATED: Formulation to use for [`optimize_dispath`](@ref optimize_dispatch), which includes the real power only formulation (`nfa`), the LinDist3Flow formulation (`lindistflow`), the AC-rectangular formulation (`acr`), or the AC-polar formulation (`acp`)

protection-settings.description: DEPRECIATED: enumerations of the protection settings (XLSX format)

debug-export-file.description: DEPRECIATED: the path to the debug output (JSON format)

use-gurobi.description: DEPRECIATED: flag to indicate usage of the Gurobi solver

solver-tolerance.description: DEPRECIATED: tolerance of the nonlinear optimization solver

timestep-hours.description: DEPRECIATED: the timestep delta, in hours

voltage-lower-bound.description: DEPRECIATED: the voltage magnitude lower bound for buses, in per-unit representation

voltage-upper-bound.description: DEPRECIATED: the voltage magnitude upper bound for buses in per-unit representation

voltage-angle-difference.description: DEPRECIATED: the maximum allowed voltage angle difference across lines, in degrees

clpu-factor.description: DEPRECIATED: the cold load pickup factor

skip.description: Parts of the ONM algorithm to skip, e.g. "--skip faults" to skip fault studies, or "--skip faults,stability" to skip both fault studies and stability analysis

pretty-print.description: Toggle to enable pretty-printed output json

nprocs.description: Number of processors to utilize for parallel computations (Fault studies and Stability Analysis)

disable-switch-penalty.description: Toggle to disable applying a penalty to changing switch status in the objective function

apply-switch-scores.description: Toggle to enable adding a weight to switches in the objective function, to promote closing

disable-radial-constraint.description: Toggle to disable the radial constraint (allow mesh-networking)

disable-isolation-constraint.description: Toggle to disable the block isolation constraint (allow power to pass through 'shedded' blocks)

disable-inverter-constraint.description: Toggle to disable the grid-forming inverter constraint that restricts only one grid-forming inverter per connected component

disable-presolver.description: Toggle to disable the presolver that exist in some MIP solvers, which can sometimes be overly agressive

disable-networking.description: Toggle to disable the ability of microgrids to network together
